description:
Ready to kick your D/s up a notch, or even try it full-time? Here’s what you need to know about consensual contracts, binding your partner into service to you, including guiding their spending habits. Penny Barber and Ella Nova demonstrate Slave Contracts as tools of negotiation and service. They also discuss and demonstrate how to use Financial Domination for deepening engagement with your submissive on a full-time level as well as money-oriented games and role playing.

(For the sample Slave Contracts mentioned in the video, visit
Kink University Forums
.)
title: Full-Time Dominance & Submission: Slave Contracts and Financial Domination
